title: Gerald Kein - Hypnosis With Children
description:
How To Use Hypnosis With Children

Program Length
2 hrs. 20 min.

Become adept at working with children by learning the specialized techniques presented in this workshop!

Children do not readily respond to the standard adult inductions or regimens. This training offers the specialized techniques required for this work!

Very often working with children is much easier than working with the typical adult. Generally, young people have little or no fear of hypnosis. Most times they will quickly enter a deep level of hypnosis through the use of very simple and easy to learn induction techniques.

In addition, the transformational therapies that are used with children are much easier than those required for adults.
This program will help you become comfortable and confident working with children!
